level.heading: Application for manager's license.
level.text: The application for a manager's license shall include:
Certification that he or she has obtained [and] read a copy of this title;
Written statements or evidence establishing to the satisfaction of the Board that the applicant meets all of the qualifications set forth in § 25-301; and
A copy of the applicant's alcohol training and education certificate.

level.heading: Prior Codifications
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-298, see notes following § 25-101.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-187, in pars. (1) and (2), made nonsubstantive changes; and added par. (3).
